params._player: Player address. requires sender to be the quest creator or the player requires sender to put a deposit (if its creator, deposit will be released to player) requires player list is not full requires quest is not expired requires player is not already registered emit QuestPlayed with player and timestamp
Player address. requires sender to be the quest creator or the player requires player is registered emit QuestUnplayed with player and timestamp

canExecute(address).notice: Verify given executer can execute this quest.

getPlayers().notice: Simply return the player list as the entire array

play(address).notice: Register a player to the quest. (sender could be the player or quest creator)

unplay(address).notice: Unregister a player from the quest. (sender could be the player or quest creator)
